doc.title: Icon Men: Rusty Jeffers - Arms, Chest, and Shoulders
doc.plot: Marvel at Rusty Jeffers, the FIRST MUSCLE ICON model! Professional Bodybuilder Rusty Jeffers is the 2004 Masters Bodybuilding Nationals Overall Winner and the Latest IFBB Pro Card Winner! How does this fitness cover model get this massive? He's going to show you in his dynamic workout DVD. Rusty teaches you his personal workout routine. He demonstrates each exercise as he pumps through his entire arms, chest and shoulders routine while teaching you his workout program. His monstrous, cut muscles nearly explode as he guides you step by step through his personal workout. Rusty has a Rock Hard, Pumped to the Max, Massive Body... and Now You Can Too! Approximately 30 minutes long, every exercise and muscle close up is shot in glorious digital detail. Also: Bonus footage of Rusty pool side practicing his astounding professional competition flexing routine.
